message: Hey everyone! Since collisions prevent us from advancing, we should try to coordinate our moves. I suggest we all pick different numbers this round to avoid wasting turns. Maybe I take 5, P2 takes 3, and P3 takes 1? This way we all advance, and we can rotate who gets which number in future rounds. What do you think?
